title: Mnuchin Looks at Loosening Regulations, Investing in Large Caps, Brexit Impact on Ireland's Economy
itunes:title: Mnuchin Looks at Loosening Regulations, Investing in Large Caps, Brexit Impact on Ireland's Economy
description:
Mnuchin Looks at Loosening Regulations, Investing in Large Caps, Brexit Impact on Ireland's Economy

Bloomberg News Bond Reporter Alex Harris talks about Treasury Secretary Mnuchin considering loosening financial crisis-era regulations. Dave Harden, CIO of Summit Global Investments, discusses risk management, fundamental analysis, and ESG investing. Martin D. Shanahan, CEO at IDA Ireland, explains why Brexit could be good for Ireland’s financial services industry. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Economics Chief Economist Tom Orlik walks through forces threatening the world’s hottest economies. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Accuvest Global Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
